headline: SingleStore Announces Growth Buyout Led by Vector Capital
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 10, 2025--SingleStore, Inc. ("SingleStore" or the "Company"), the leading data platform for enterprise AI, today announced it has entered into an agreement with Vector Capital Management, L.P. ("Vector"), a private equity firm with a nearly three decade track record leading transformational investments in established technology businesses, in which Vector will lead a growth buyout of SingleStore. headline: Google- and Dell-Backed SingleStore Sold to Vector Capital
summary: Terms of the deal weren’t disclosed in a statement Wednesday that confirmed an earlier Bloomberg News report.  Vector and its co-investors are investing about $500 million in equity in SingleStore, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified because the matter is private.

headline: QBTS in Focus Amid Quantum Launches, Competition With IBM, HON
summary: QBTS stock price likely to rise as the company launches Advantage2, tackles AI and eyes 100K-qubit system amid IBM and Honeywell competition.

headline: Thanks to AI, this guy is running a Google rival from his laundry room
summary: Large language models aren’t just making mainstream search engines worse; they’re making the next generation of search engines easier to develop.
